feed.title: Phix Project PEAR channel Latest Releases

entry.title: Autoloader 3.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: Autoloader is a PSR0-compatible autoloader.

entry.title: Autoloader 2.0.1 (stable)
entry.content: Autoloader is a PSR0-compatible autoloader.

entry.title: CommandLineLib 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: CommandLineLib is a simple-to-use PHP component that provides a high-quality command line parser via a fluid interface.

entry.title: ComponentManager 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManager allows you to create and maintain a variety of components, such as PHP libraries and Docbooks.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpDocbook 2.0.1 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpDocbook contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-docbook component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpDocbook 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpDocbook contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-docbook component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary 2.1.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-library component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary 2.0.3 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-library component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary 2.0.2 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-library component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary 2.0.1 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-library component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-library component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary 1.3.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpLibrary contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-library component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerPhpWebapp 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManagerPhpWebapp contains the code and skeleton files required to create and manage a php-webapp component.

entry.title: ComponentManagerShared 2.1.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManager-Shared holds the shared code used in the management of different kinds of components.

entry.title: ComponentManagerShared 2.0.2 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManager-Shared holds the shared code used in the management of different kinds of components.

entry.title: ComponentManagerShared 2.0.1 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManager-Shared holds the shared code used in the management of different kinds of components.

entry.title: ComponentManagerShared 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: ComponentManager-Shared holds the shared code used in the management of different kinds of components.

entry.title: ConsoleDisplayLib 3.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: ConsoleDisplayLib is a simple reusable library for writing word-wrapped output to a terminal, possibly in colour.

entry.title: DocbookTools 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: This package contains the standard (ie unmodified) Docbook and related tools for use by conversion tools such as ComponentManager's PhpDocbook. These have been broken out into this package because they are large, and very seldom change.

entry.title: ExtenderLib 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: Description goes here

entry.title: FopTools 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: This package contains the standard (ie unmodified) Apache FOP and related tools for use by conversion tools such as ComponentManager's PhpDocbook. These have been broken out into this package because they are large, and very seldom change.

entry.title: PhpInfo 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: A simple PHP component to demonstrate what happens when you ship web pages inside a PHP component.

entry.title: ValidationLib 2.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: Inspired by Zend Framework, this is a lightweight library of reusable data validation tools.

entry.title: phix 0.13.0 (stable)
entry.content: A handy command-line tool to provide structure to any commands / tasks you need to run on the command line.

entry.title: phix4componentdev 0.13.0 (stable)
entry.content: phix4componentdev is a meta-package that installs phix itself, plus all of the phix extensions required for creating and maintaining PHP components, plus all of the third-party tools you'll need to use.
